events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the wrong item received by the customer.
Assigning this refund request case to the customer support agent specialized in order issues.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the problem?
Sure, my order number is 98234756. I've attached a photo showing the incorrect product that was sent to me.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and arrange a prepaid return label for the item.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate the prompt response and refund offer.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the return label was emailed to you. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and were able to return the incorrect item without any issues.
Since the refund was received and the return process completed smoothly, we have closed this case. Thank you!
